Defines

#define orxDLLAPI
#define orxSDKAPI   orxDLLIMPORT
#define _orxALIGN(ADDRESS, BLOCK_SIZE)   ((ADDRESS + (BLOCK_SIZE - 1)) & (~(BLOCK_SIZE - 1)))
#define orxALIGN16(ADDRESS)   _orxALIGN(ADRESS, 16)
#define orxALIGN32(ADDRESS)   _orxALIGN(ADRESS, 32)
#define orxALIGN64(ADDRESS)   _orxALIGN(ADRESS, 64)
#define orxPAD(SIZE)
#define orxSWAP32(A, B)
#define orxFLAG_TEST_ALL(X, F)   (((X) & (F)) == (F))
#define orxFLAG_TEST(X, F)   (((X) & (F)) != 0)
#define orxFLAG_GET(X, M)   ((X) & (M))
#define orxFLAG_SET(X, A, R)

Detailed Description

Base declarations Allows to creates and handle Sets of Anims. It consists of a structure containing Anims and their relations. It also contains functions for handling and accessing them. AnimSets are structures. They thus can be referenced by Anim Pointers.

Masked flags

#define orxFLAG_SET ( X,
A,
R   ) 

Value:

do                            \
{                             \
  (X) &= ~(R);                \
  (X) |= (A);                 \
} while(orxFALSE)

Parameters:

[in] A Flags to add

#define orxFLAG_TEST ( X,
F   )     (((X) & (F)) != 0)

Tests flags

Parameters:
[in] X Flag container
[in] F Flags to test
Returns:
true if at least one flag is present

#define orxFLAG_TEST_ALL ( X,
F   )     (((X) & (F)) == (F))

Parameters:
[in] X Flag container
[in] F Flags to test
Returns:
true if flags are all presents

#define orxPAD ( SIZE   ) 

#define orxSDKAPI   orxDLLIMPORT

#define orxSWAP32 ( A,
B   ) 

Value:

do                                                            \
{                                                             \
  *((orxU32 *)&(A)) = *((orxU32 *)&(A)) ^ *((orxU32 *)&(B));  \
  *((orxU32 *)&(B)) = *((orxU32 *)&(A)) ^ *((orxU32 *)&(B));  \
  *((orxU32 *)&(A)) = *((orxU32 *)&(A)) ^ *((orxU32 *)&(B));  \
} while(orxFALSE)
Fast in-place swap macros for two 32-bits objects.
